import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import ResumePrice from '../resumePrice/ResumePrice' import CarouselSlider from '../carruselSlider/carruselSlider' import { useContext } from "react"; import Context from "../provider/context" import "./cart.css" import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; export default function Cart() { const { store,removeFromCart} = useContext(Context); const alert =(product) => { Swal.fire({ position: 'center', icon: 'error', title: 'Producto agregado a carrito', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 1500 }) removeFromCart(product) } return (

Productos en el carrito :

{ store.length != 0 ? store.map((product, index) => (

{product.nombre}

Precio:

{product.precio} US$

Cantidad:

{product.quantity}

)) : "No hay productos en tu carrito :("}
) }
